name: Marvel vs Capcom 2 Online Trivia | Marvel vs Capcom | 10 Questions

questions.text: There are 28 characters each from "Marvel" and "Capcom".
questions.explanation:
True.

	There is a total of 56 characters so each side has 28 characters.

questions.text: Which character is the weakest throughout the game?
questions.explanation:
Servbot.

	Sentinel is one of the strongest, and Roll pretty weak but not as weak as Servbot.

questions.text: Which of these characters has Shinkuu Hadoken for a Level 1 Super?
questions.explanation:
Ryu.

	Zelda isn't even a Marvel or Capcom character.

questions.text: How many Super Bars total can you have?
questions.explanation:
5.

	In the first "Marvel vs Capcom" you could only have 3 on this version you it says Max but it really is 5.

questions.text: Akuma has the same the super as who?
questions.explanation:
Ken.

	Blanka isn't even in this game and Zangeif only does wrestling moves and Charlie has basically the same moves as Guile.

questions.text: Once I transform I get darker and now know Shinku Hadoken and Raging Demon. Which character am I?
questions.explanation:
Sakura.

	Akuma already has Raging Demon and Shinku-Hadouken.

questions.text: When I perform my level three sucessfully I get one hit off as each Marvel character, who am I?
questions.explanation:
Spiral.

	Shuma-Gorath level three is a grab one too but it doesn't get a hit off as each "Marvel" character.

questions.text: Which of these characters don't have a level three?
questions.explanation:
Dhalsim.

	Dhalsim has no level three each of the other three have a level three.

True.

	Magneto's two supers are Magnetic Shockwave and Magnetic Tempest.

questions.text: Which three characters have the super Shinku Hadouken?
questions.explanation:
Akuma, Ryu, Dark Sakura.

	When you transform Sakura into Dark Sakura she has the Shinku Hadoken as well as Akuma and Ryu.
